output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount = msg.value / buyPrice'.
Integer overflow in sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice'.
mintToken function generates a pseudo-random token amount, allowing attackers to control the minted token supply.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, allowing arbitrary transfers.
